verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Praise Him on the trumpet the psaltery and harp,
Praise Him on the timbrel and the dance,
Praise Him on stringed instruments too.
Praise Him on the loud cymbals,
Praise Him on the loud cymbals,
Let ev'rything that has breath praise the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Hallelujah praise the Lord,
Hallelujah praise the Lord,
Let ev'rything that has breath, praise the Lord.
(repeat)
